unnormalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!
normalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! It’s almost that time of year again - exam season! Whether you’re prepping for your Class 10 boards in Delhi or grinding for the JEE at IIT Kanpur, we all know the struggle is real. But don’t worry, chill maaro! Technology is here to help. Gone are the days of solely relying on thick textbooks and endless notes (although those are still important!). Now, we have a whole arsenal of exam prep apps at our fingertips.

unnormalised: I remember preparing for my MBA entrance exams, and let me tell you, these apps were a lifesaver! Instead of lugging around heavy books, I could revise on the bus ride from Bandra to Churchgate using just my phone.
normalised: I remember preparing for my M B A entrance exams, and let me tell you, these apps were a lifesaver! Instead of lugging around heavy books, I could revise on the bus ride from Bandra to Churchgate using just my phone.

unnormalised: So, which apps are actually worth downloading? Well, there’s the usual suspects like BYJU’s and Vedantu, which offer comprehensive courses and personalized learning paths. But don’t underestimate the power of simpler apps too! Apps that focus on mock tests are incredibly helpful. Think of them like a practice cricket match before the actual final – you can identify your weak areas and improve your performance. Plus, many offer detailed analytics, showing you exactly where you're losing marks.

unnormalised: There are also some great apps focused on specific subjects. Need help with quantitative aptitude? There’s an app for that! Struggling with organic chemistry? You guessed it, an app for that too! Do a little digging and you'll find something that fits your specific needs.

unnormalised: One tip: Don't just download a bunch of apps and forget about them. Be consistent! Spend at least 30 minutes, maybe even 1 hr, each day using these apps. Consistency is key, just like celebrating Onam every year with the same enthusiasm!
